channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Multiple potholes, 18th June
item.description:
The whole road needs re surfacing as potholes are conitually repaired which must be costing more money. Patching is not required but re surfacing is.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Guise Avenue, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Trees outside no 7&8 have large overhang make it difficult to see when pulling out of drive onto roac, 18th June
item.description:
Outside number 7 and 8 Bradley rd
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7, Bradley Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Weeds, 18th June
item.description:
Generally poor state of gutters and grass verges in Springbank. Weeds and vegetation growing around trees on verges, obstructing visibility of kerbs in some areas. Springbank Road in Fiddlers Green area and Dunster Road are among worst examples.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 50b, Springbank Road, Springbank, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Highly offensive graffiti, 18th June
item.description:
More political highly offensive graffiti on side of NCP with c-word in massive letters
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dunalley Street, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overground Hedge row obstructing Path, 18th June
item.description:
This is the footpath from the top of the hill to the bottom where the footpath stops. This has been growing for some time now and now the footpath is impassable, forcing pedestrians on the road. This past is used to access the bus stop on the A38 towards Gloucester. With no place to cross the safest place is at the bottom of the hill and walk up this footpath. But now you can no longer do this.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road, Leigh, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
